page.title: 03Log Book
page.content: 1877 25th May -Cautioned children playing round the new tank at the end of the school. 6th July-good many children absent because of the hay harvest. 7th December-school visited by Mr Rows who said that medical officer advised to close school because of an out break of fever in Gweek. 1882 30th November-Woman withdrew her children from school,all to go to Helston Union. 1887 21st January-REPORT,The girls show a fair knowledge of geography.But maybe to much is expected of them. 1889 28th June-caution boys playing with donkey kept in playground.
